name: Maniac Marbles
description:
This is a prototype design for UCSC's Game Technologies class. 

There is no real goal.

Controls:

Look with Mouse

Click to Orient Gravity such that the face the reticle is on is "down"

WASD to apply rolling force in a direction (there is currently no air control)

Press Space when the "Topically Applied Genes" counter turns green to rebirth

Escape to Pause/ for Menu
